messages.title: A 'Living Wage' for all
messages.content: We think it's unfair that irresponsible bankers go on earning huge salaries while 4 million UK children live in poverty. We think it's unfair that the Government have allowed to do anything about the growing gap between rich and poor.

messages.title: A million new jobs
messages.content: We think it's unfair that so many people are unemployed when there's vital work that needs doing. Bringing Britain's housing up to 'green' standards could create hundreds of thousands of jobs - plumbers, electricians and engineers.

messages.title: Protect our NHS
messages.content: We think it's unfair that hospitals and health centres are treated like businesses rather than vital public services. We want to make sure no more public money is wasted on badly implemented privatisation schemes.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Green MPs will demand a 'Living Wage' to ensure a fair provision of wealth and provide families with financial deals, credit for community banks, and realistic loans to families and small businesses.

Green MPs will press for a green insulation scheme for every single home as part of a green package to cut fuel bills and create a million new jobs. Green Party councillors have already pioneered such a scheme in Kirklees.
Green MPs will fight to make sure local services are local. We will oppose and cuts, closures AND privatisation within our NHS and protect the jobs of public sector workers.

issues.economy: Green MPs will demand a 'Living Wage' to ensure a fair provision of wealth and provide financial deals, credit for community banks, and realistic loans to families and small businesses.
issues.environment: Green MPs will press for a green insulation scheme for every single home as part of a green package to cut fuel bills and create a million new jobs.
issues.health: Green MPs will fight to make sure local services are local. We will oppose and cuts, closures AND privatisation within our NHS and protect the jobs of public sector workers.

housing.content: Green MPs will press for a green insulation scheme for every single home as part of a green package to cut fuel bills and create a million new jobs.

images.caption: Greener industry will provide millions of new jobs
Green MPs will ensure health services are truly local as we oppose and cuts, closures and privatisation
MEP AWARDS 2008 - Green Party leader and MEP Caroline Lucas receives the prestigious Politician of the Year award from MEP of the Year 2008 magazine as a 'world of work ambassador' for her group.
